text: I’m not sure if this is a bug or a suggestion, but it seems the Visibility setting is removed from the Styles tab if the module has any style fields… I would assume a bug, especially based on the help tooltip below the visibility setting for a module with no style fields: “Modules with style fields enabled will display *additional* options here.” This seems to have been an issue for months at a minimum, I simply just now realized what was causing it.

If anyone else is struggling with this, for the time being, here’s my workaround:

Duplicate the module to create a new row, then set the visibility options on the row for desktop and mobile as you’d like, then go to the Contents tab and delete the duplicated module.
